product.description: We are working on an innovative hot water controller, which will allow you to reduce the energy use, cost and infection risk during production, storage and distribution of your domestic hot water. This is possible by lowering the domestic hot water production temperature, while keeping the Legionella pneumophila risk under control with the heat shock regime.

services.description:
LoWatter provides case-specific knowledge through consultancy on disinfection or energy savings with a Legionella pneumophila predictive simulation model to reduce energy use, costs and infection risk during the production, storage and distribution of domestic hot water. 


 Our consultancy approach follows the following steps: 
 
 STEP 1. Notification of Legionella problem
 
 STEP 2. Study hydraulic scheme
 
 STEP 3. Site visit
 
 STEP 4. Perform additional measurements (of temperatures, flow rates, Legionella concentrations) 
 
 STEP 5. Compile a simulation model of the hot water system 
 
 STEP 6. Calculate variants of system renovation or control 
 
 STEP 7. Advice on the most effective variant (in terms of health, energy and water use, costs) 
 
 STEP 8. Support during implementation
